title: League of Legends installer error
body:
I just dug up my old pc and had it reset to factory settings. i then used 1-2 days updating every windows update needed. i downloaded the lol wizard installer, i select language -> agree terms -> next -> next -> and then at the last page i get to press "install". as i do i starts the download, but stops after 2 seconds, opening a window saying "are you sure you want to cancel league of legends installation" as if i had clicked cancel or x. i have 2 choices, either yes or no, but regardless of what i press, it takes me back to the start of the wizard. meaning i cant download it.. whats the bug? help would really be appreciated.

- Jesper, Denmark

replies.body: You might have a software or setting on your PC blocking the installation from continuing.  To start, try the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that access is being allowed.  Let me know if that works!

Thanks! i turned of UAC and somehow it started to download! Should i turn it on after download is finished?
Thanks again! - Jesper
